ModMetaData.name: Tabletop Trove - Additional Joy Objects and Decor
ModMetaData.author: SoulfulPumpkin
ModMetaData.description:
Tabletop Trove adds additional objects and decor to your colony.
Simply research 'Tabletop Games' at a research bench or buy them from travelling traders.
Includes: - DM Screen and Character Sheets for Cellars & Dwellers - Monopsony - Sorcery, the Assembly - Colonists of the Rim - Discrete Dictator - One - Treachery at the Mansion in the Woods
- Affix Six - The Game of Strife - Luiga Board - Janko
- Board Game Boxes - Player Handbook
